buginformation.summary: A bug in AsyncTaskManager.java
buginformation.description: May be a bug ? public int add(final ManagedAsyncTask task, final boolean exec, final T... params) { final int hashCode = task.hashCode(); mTasks.add(task); if (exec) { execute(hashCode); // This line should be params, Is it a bug? } return hashCode; }

buginformation.summary: Incorrect text handling - Unicode Control Characters.
buginformation.description: Twidere doesn't correctly handle Unicode characters in the range U+007F to U+009F. Consider this Tweet https://twitter.com/edent/status/660619240077197312 The API returns Nothing\u0083\u0084\u0085\u0086 odd\u0087\u0088\u0089\u008a going\u008b\u008c \u008don\u008e \u008f\u0090\u0091here! This is how it is rendered on the latest version of Twidere. I'd suggest that the character either be stripped out, or encoded correctly before display.

buginformation.summary: Can't open twitter links
buginformation.description: hi, on the latest two versions of Twidere i can't open twitter links anymore. nothing happens when i click on them.

buginformation.summary: "Edit media" button does nothing
buginformation.description: Twidere 0.3.0-131 from F-Droid, Android 5.1.1 (Cyanognemod 12.1). The Edit menu item works in the Gallery app.

buginformation.description: On Twidere 0.3.0-130 from F-Droid.

buginformation.description: ... and as a result, the actual tabs shown are in an outdated state. Twidere 0.3.0-135 from F-Droid.

buginformation.summary: Settings 鈫� Notifications 鈫� [account] 鈫� Light Color glitch
buginformation.description: When you change this setting and press "OK" in the dialog, it does not update in the parent view. Version 0.3.0-dev-135

buginformation.summary: RTL text in username causes glitches
buginformation.description: If a user's name contains RTL text (for example Arabic or Hebrew) Twidere displays the name incorrectly in timeline view: _example@ 賲孬丕賱 rather than 賲孬丕賱 @example_ For example: Here's how the Tweet is displayed on Twitter's mobile site: If we take a look at the user's page, you'll see that the user info box at the top is displaying the @ name correctly although the Arabic text is hidden behind the "Follow" button.

buginformation.summary: Retweets won't be translated
buginformation.description: No description provided.

buginformation.summary: Icon misplaced
buginformation.description: Icon will misplaced in Notifications tab when profile image is turned off http://imgur.com/tYZXtty

buginformation.summary: UI glitches when swiping tabs quickly
buginformation.description: When quickly swiping through my tabs, the white underline sometimes indicates a wrong current tab. Plus, the content of two tabs overlap or share the screen. Nexus 5 / OmniROM 5.1.1 / Twidere F-Droid 94ad1a6

buginformation.summary: User filters not working
buginformation.description: I can add filters by keyword, sources or links, but not users. After searching and clicking on the name, the windows closes and returns to the list.

buginformation.summary: Force close when trying to play YouTube video
buginformation.description: Using version 0.3.0-dev160115 Whenever I try to open a YouTube video in a tweet, Twidere will crash completely. Also, if I expand the tweet, the video shows up twice: once as an inline video, and once as an embedded YouTube video. Image of this behavior: http://i.imgur.com/7NoQlJ1.jpg It would be ideal to fix the crash caused by the video player on the top rather than get rid of it, as the one on the bottom cannot use full screen.

buginformation.summary: Wrong time at GNU social posts
buginformation.description: I have made the observation that posts from GNU social have the wrong time. It is like the "clock" for GNU social posts gains an hour. As the following screenshot (the blurring is added by me) shows the newest posts have been posted "in 57 minutes" instead of 3 minutes ago. Twidere version is 0.3.0 dev 2016-01-26 and this bug also existed in the current version from F-Droid when I once tried GNU social with it some days ago.

buginformation.summary: Unable to change DM font size
buginformation.description: No description provided.

buginformation.summary: Twidere tries to obtain location each time I open it / unlock lockscreen / start writing a tweet
buginformation.description: I have an unofficial Kitkat build for my FP1, which features a built-in app permission management. The issue I denied location access to Twidere the first time, it asked me for it. Now I get a notification overlay each time, location access gets denied. Some sceenshots to illustrate my point: This is after unlocking the lockscreen (note the notification overlay in the bottom of the screenshot): This is when I open Twidere: This is when I start writing a tweet (note that I don't attach my location to my tweet): My questions: Is it intended behaviour, that Twidere wants my location in all the above occasions? If yes, how can I turn this behaviour off? If not: Which information, other then the below, do you need to fix this? My system FP1 with MT6589 chip, running on Android KitKat 4.4.4 / Kernel Version 3.4.67 Cheers, :)

buginformation.summary: List details cannot hold more than 100 chars instead of 160 characters
buginformation.description: Hello, when I add more than 100 characters to a list's description, I get an error warning: "Error 85: Failed list validation." This description triggers the error: My system FP1 with MT6589 chipset running on Android Kitkat 4.4.4

buginformation.summary: Unable to open tweet location

buginformation.summary: Long wait for start
buginformation.description: For 0.3.0 version on my device (nexus 5, Android 6.0.1) first launch (when app isn't in memory) takes much more time than at previous version. I need 2-3 seconds after press the icon to see app instead of nearly instantly launching at previous version.

buginformation.summary: Remember position failing
buginformation.description: The new update isn't remembering the position and reloads at the latest tweet.

buginformation.summary: First item flashing while refresh
buginformation.description: No description provided.

buginformation.summary: Crash during login to GNU Social instances
buginformation.description: It doesn't seem to matter where I try to login with the released version (eg. https://api.loadaverage.org/ Basic auth) the screen will go blank and then Twidere will restart. The bigger problem is that after this it won't be able to refresh the timeline or send new tweets until I destroy the database and kill the running process. Then it'll work again (no reauthentication needed).

buginformation.summary: MediaViewerActivity: Youtube videos not shareable
buginformation.description: In the MediaViewerActivity, Youtube videos are not shareable via the share symbol. No menu opens, it just happens nothing. Other videos seem to work fine.

buginformation.summary: Notification Sound / Vibration Not Working
buginformation.description: The latest version of Twidere for Android does not show any kind of notification besides the little bell icon on the notifications bar. That's happening for mention notifications on Moto G and LG G2, as far as I've tested. Before that, there was sound, but it was the default notification sound and LED color as well, despite any custom configuration.

buginformation.summary: Attaching image to reply hides text

To view/edit the text, the keyboard must be closed and the cursor moved. Possible solution is to reduce the thumbnails for attached images? (The text box should still be the most important element)

buginformation.summary: Can only type numbers in RetypeEmail Verification Dialog
buginformation.description: If encountered RetypeEmail verification, you can only type numbers, no characters, which makes it impossible to pass the verification. I have a modification here, works for me: // Insert at SignInActivity.java:922 if ("RetypeEmail".equalsIgnoreCase(challengeType)) { editVerification.setInputType(InputType.TYPE_CLASS_TEXT | InputType.TYPE_TEXT_VARIATION_EMAIL_ADDRESS); } else { editVerification.setInputType(InputType.TYPE_CLASS_NUMBER | InputType.TYPE_NUMBER_VARIATION_PASSWORD); }

buginformation.summary: Click on a new interaction notification doesn't stop the notification for good
buginformation.description: When i get the notification about new interaction in status bar and i click on it i am sent to interactions tab and the notification disapear. buginformation.summary: Feature request: Improve HTML parser
buginformation.description:
Twidere is reading the contents of the field "statusnet_html" if present. The content seems to be put into some HTML parser. This parser seems to have problems with many HTML elements. So it doesn't do a linebreak after an
or or before an . But it does something that a html parser shouldn't do: It parses linebreaks. Since it mostly is a problem that Twidere has especially with Friendica, I will write a workaround for Friendica.

buginformation.summary: We can't create new posts on GNU social
buginformation.description: I've just seen you moved the GH project to here. That's a feature the GS users asked you a few months ago, with the last version we can't add our accounts and it's sort of annoying to stay always with an old version. Update: Loging in: https://server.domain/api Basic "No suffix" enabled Deleting the limit characters: Press ##8943373## The problem: Now we're logged in but we can't post new messages, just replies.
